alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 31 at 7:44PM CDT until November 04 at 5:25AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Trinidad. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Moderate flooding will occur along the right bank to agricultural fields and the cattle industry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 37.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 33.0 feet. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.8 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
